fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • The caption to a picture of a train passing over the river Nidd viaduct said that it was in “Harrogate, North Yorkshire” (On track for a snow day, 9 March, page 5). That referred to the borough, not the town, of Harrogate. As a number of readers contacted us to say, the viaduct is in the town of Knaresborough. • We misspelled the last name of Belinda Kleinig, a winemaker at Marks and Spencer, as Konig (Let’s raise a glass to women winemakers, 3 March, page 13, Feast).
